scripts.test: node_modules/.bin/mocha src/*.spec.ts  src/**/*.spec.ts  src/**/**/*.spec.ts src/**/**/**/*.spec.ts src/**/**/**/**/*.spec.ts --recursive true --require node_modules/ts-node/register --exit
scripts.coverage: node node_modules/nyc/bin/nyc.js --exclude '**/*.spec.ts' --exclude 'src/config.ts' --extension .ts --reporter lcov --reporter text npm run test
scripts.build: npm run clean && node ./node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode production && chmod +x ./dist/{{name}}
scripts.tsc: npm run clean && node node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc --p tsconfig.json
scripts.docs:
node node_modules/typedoc/bin/typedoc --out docs/ src/ && echo '*
!.gitignore' > docs/.gitignore
